description: The order reasons on the Advance Beneficiary Notice (ABN) form for why the order failed medical necessity checks.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note (HNO) record that contains the Advance Beneficiary Notice (ABN) information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ABN_ORD_REASONS
columns.description: The order reasons listed on the ABN form for the procedures that failed medical necessity checks
